trans-unit.source: Implements the standard console logger that outputs event data to the console window during a build.
trans-unit.target: 빌드하는 동안를 콘솔 창에 이벤트 데이터를 출력 하는 표준 콘솔으로 거를 구현 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity"></xref>.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity"></xref> to apply to the logger.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity"></xref>, <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ColorSetter"></xref>, and <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ColorResetter"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger"> </xref> 지정된 된 <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity"> </xref>, <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ColorSetter"> </xref>, 및 <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ColorResetter"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity"></xref> to apply to the logger.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.WriteHandler"></xref> for the logger to use.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.WriteHandler"> </xref> 사용 하 여로 거에 대해 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ColorSetter"></xref> for the logger to use.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ColorSetter"> </xref> 사용 하 여로 거에 대해 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ColorResetter"></xref> for the logger to use.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ColorResetter"> </xref> 사용 하 여로 거에 대해 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified parameter name and value to the logger.
trans-unit.target: 로 거에 지정 된 매개 변수 이름 및 값을 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: The parameter name to add to the logger.
trans-unit.target: 로 거에 추가할 매개 변수 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The parameter value to assign to the `parameterName`.
Handles the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.BuildFinished"></xref> event.
The source of the event.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildFinishedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildFinishedEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.BuildStarted"></xref> event.
The source of the event.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildStartedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildStartedEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.CustomEventRaised"></xref> event.
The source of the event.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.CustomBuildEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.CustomBuildEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.ErrorRaised"></xref> event.
The source of the event.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildErrorEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildErrorEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Registers the logger for the specified events.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource"></xref> to register with the logger.
Registers the logger for the specified events.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource"></xref> to register with the logger.
The number of nodes to initialize.
Handles the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.MessageRaised"></xref> event.
The source of the event.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildMessageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildMessageEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the parameters passed to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 전달 된 매개 변수를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The parameters passed to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger"></xref>.
Handles the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.ProjectFinished"></xref> event.
The source of the event.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ProjectFinishedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ProjectFinishedEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.ProjectStarted"></xref> event.
The source of the event.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ProjectStartedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ProjectStartedEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the logger will display a summary of errors and warnings.
trans-unit.target: 로 거를 오류 및 경고 요약을 표시할지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the logger will display a summary of errors and warnings; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>로 거는 오류 및 경고;의 요약 정보를 표시 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Stops the logger and releases all resources.
trans-unit.target: 로 거를 중지 하 고 모든 리소스를 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default console logger does not need to release any resources.
trans-unit.target: 기본 콘솔으로 거 리소스를 해제할 필요는 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: This method does nothing.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the logger will display messages when new projects are started during the build.
trans-unit.target: 새 프로젝트는 빌드 중에 시작 될 때로 거 메시지를 표시할지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display messages when new projects are started during the build; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>새 프로젝트 빌드에 있습니다; 동안 시작 될 때 메시지를 표시 하려면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Handles the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.TargetFinished"></xref> event.
The source of the event.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.TargetFinishedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.TargetFinishedEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.TaskFinishedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.TaskFinishedEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

The source of the event.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.TaskStartedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.TaskStartedEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity"></xref> level of the logger.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity"></xref> level of the logger.
Handles the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.WarningRaised"></xref> event.
The source of the event.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildWarningEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.WriteHandler"></xref> delegate for the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다는 <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.WriteHandler"> </xref> 에 대 한 대리자는 <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.WriteHandler"></xref> delegate for the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ConsoleLogger"></xref>.
